word: May the Lord help you to cut loose from every fetter, and to bind yourself up with the love and in the protection of an all-powerful Friend. Do not be lukewarm in this matter. Resolve that with God's help you will build up a worthy character and will exert an influence for Christ and the right.--Letter 137, 1904, pp. 1, 2, 4, 5. (To "My Dear Young Friend, Mr. Heizemiam," April 11, 1904.)
